I've been working on this project to research the influence of substrate to=
pology on a learn-to-race task. 

However, my harddrive crashed and now I'm=
 trying to recover my work from a backup. The problem is, somehow my code, =
that previously worked fine, gives problems. 

It goes wrong when trying to=
 read a .properties file:

/**
 * loads properties from file
 * @param reso=
urce a file in the application classpath
 * @throws IOException
 */
public =
void loadFromResourceWithoutLogging( String resource ) throws IOException {=

	InputStream in =3D ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream( resource );
	lo=
ad( in ); 
	setName( resource ); 
}

Inputstream in =3D null, which gives a=
 nullpointer exception at load(in). 

String resource is an absolute path t=
o the location where my .properties file is.

I even tried downloading the =
original ahni package again, and trying to run one of the original properti=
es files, and still get a nullpointer. 

Any help would be GREATLY apprecia=
ted, because I have no clue how to resolve this.
